text: Clouse is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Mark Clouse (born 1968), American businessman *Michael J. Clouse, American record producer and songwriter *Robert Clouse (1928–1997), American film director and producer *Robert Clouse (professor) (1931–2016), American religious scholar *Steve Clouse (born 1956), American politician *Wynne F. Clouse (1883–1944), American politician
title: Clouse
